text: Admiral Devendra Kumar Joshi, PVSM, AVSM, YSM, NM, VSM (Retd.) (born 4 July 1954) is an Indian military official and politician. He is the Lieutenant Governor of Andaman and Nicobar Islands and the Vice Chairman of Islands Development Agency (IDA). He was an Admiral in the Indian Navy and was the 21st Chief of Naval Staff of the Indian Navy. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Indian military people Category:Lieutenant governors of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands
title: Devendra Kumar Joshi
